name: interliner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a layer of material between the surface of something and its lining (= a material that covers the inside surface) : Our sofas have an interliner which is fireproof. The interliner is inserted between the main fabric and the lining.
More examplesFewer examplesThe interliner protects upholstery against fire and allows outer layers to be easily removed to be washed.If the fabric does not meet the approved standard, then we would advise that it is used with a fire-retardant interliner.As long as the outer fabric is at least 80% natural, then the interliner will have been treated.
